title: Jennifer Aniston is following ex Justin Theroux on Instagram
text:
She joined the popular social media app Instagram on Tuesday morning.

And Jennifer Aniston, who has garnered 243,000 plus followers in the three hours since creating her profile, has already pushed the follow button for her famous friends - including her ex husband Justin Theroux.

Justin, 49, liked her first post and also took to the comments section and wrote: 'Woot-woot! #first,' adding several emojis including a heart.

Happier times: Jennifer Aniston, who has garnered 173,000 plus followers in two hours since creating her profile, has already pushed the follow button for her famous friends - including her ex husband Justin Theroux; pictured in 2017

Her pal Courteney also took to the comments section and wrote 'love you,' adding two black hearts and two clapping emojis.

Reese Witherspoon commented; 'YASSSS!!! Welcome to Insta Jen!!!!' while Chelsea Handler wrote: 'Oh, yeah tushy!' and Kyle Richards posted three clapping emojis.

Jennifer, 50, currently following 83 people - including Justin.

The Friends star is following of her former castmates from the hit show - Courteney Cox, Matt LeBlanc, Lisa Kudrow and David Schwimmer.

Matthew Perry does not have an Instagram account.

Famous friends: Many of her pals took to the comments section to express their glee at her joining the social media site

Good terms: Justin, 49, also took to the comments section and wrote: 'Woot-woot! #first,' adding several emojis including a heart

Good terms: Jennifer currently following 83 people - including Justin

Pals: Her Friends co-star took to the comments section as well

Jennifer also follows Eva Mendes, Orlando Bloom, Whitney Cummings, Rita Wilson, Sara Foster, Adam Sandler, Lake Bell, Jessica Biel, Nicole Kidman, Kathy Najimy, and Melissa McCarthy.

As well as Gabby Reece, Kate Hudson, Robert Downey Jr, Katy Perry, Julianne Moore, Julia Roberts, David Spade, Jimmy Kimmel, Reese Witherspoon, Gwyneth Paltrow, Will Arnett, Justin Timberlake, Selena Gomez and Leonardo DiCaprio.

Jennifer also follows Oprah Winfrey, the Ellen Show, Chelsea Handler, Gloria Steinem, Michelle Obama and Dolly Parton.

The movie star follows upcoming series The Morning Show, Apple TV, St. Jude, the Row, Tom Ford and even Comments By Celebs.

Her first post was a a selfie she took with with her former friends co-stars Courteney, Matt, David, Matthew and Lisa.

She cheekily wrote: 'And now we're Instagram FRIENDS too. Hi Instagram,' adding a waving hand emoji.

Real life friends: Her first post was a a selfie she took with with her former friends co-stars Courteney, Matt, David, Matthew and Lisa

She also began trolling on Instagram soon after opening her page; the star commented under Matt's September 19 post of a promotional image from Friends telling him he doesn't have to use a hashtag for her anymore since now she has Instagram.

Matt had written: 'Celebrating a Thursday night 25 years ago. Seems like yesterday. Thanks to all the fans for watching. #friends #friends25 @lisakudrow @_schwim_ @courteneycoxofficial #jenniferaniston #matthewperry.'

Jennifer commented: 'You don't have to # me anymore.'

Clarifying: She also began trolling on Instagram soon after opening her page; the star commented under Matt's September 19 post of a promotional image from Friends telling him he doesn't have to use a hashtag for her anymore since now she has Instagram

Jennifer and Justin began dating in May 2011; the actors got engaged on August 10, 2012 and tied the knot on August 5, 2015.

The former flames separated at the end of 2017 but remain on good terms.

Prior to Justin, Jennifer was married to Brad Pitt; they dated in 1998 and got married on July 29, 2000; they split in January 2005 and he went on to marry Angelina Jolie, whom he is in the midst of divorcing.
